keyMoments.title: Luffy Battles Hody on Noah
keyMoments.description: Luffy fights Hody Jones on the falling Noah, demonstrating his post-timeskip abilities including Haki-enhanced attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew captain's growth and his commitment to saving Fish-Man Island despite the danger.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Hody's Energy Steroid Transformation
keyMoments.description: Captain Hody Jones consumes additional Energy Steroids and transforms into a more powerful form, threatening Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Escalates the threat level and demonstrates the crew's reliance on artificial enhancement rather than genuine strength.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with jagged teeth and a sun symbol behind it

keyMoments.title: Fukaboshi Rescues Luffy and Fights Hody
keyMoments.description: Commander Fukaboshi rescues Luffy from drowning and engages Hody Jones in battle, demonstrating his Merman Combat abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Neptune Army's commitment to protecting the kingdom and their willingness to fight alongside the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Ammo Knights Prepare Massive Air Bubble
keyMoments.description: The Ammo Knights (royal guards) work to prepare a massive air bubble to surround Noah on Fukaboshi's orders.
keyMoments.significance: Coordinated military effort to save Fish-Man Island from destruction.
